trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> event is raised for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> that is visible on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>Denne hendelsen oppstår for hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>som er synlig for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, set the properties in a DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs to change the appearance of the cell instead of directly accessing a cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil forbedre ytelsen, må du angi egenskaper i DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs å endre utseendet av celle i stedet for direkte tilgang til en celle i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If you manually paint the cell, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du manuelt maler cellen, angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you do not set <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to `true`, the cell will paint over your customizations.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til `true`, cellen vil maler over tilpasninger.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the cell to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som inneholder cellen males.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å fargemerknader i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer området i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som må tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som inneholder grensene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som blir malt.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen i cellen som males.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Kolonneindeks i cellen som males.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> verdier som angir tilstanden til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Dataene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som blir malt.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: De formaterte dataene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som blir malt.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: En feilmelding som er knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om cellen formatering og stil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som inneholder Kantlinjestilene for celle som males.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> verdier som angir delene skal males.

trans-unit.source: dataGridView is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewis .

trans-unit.source: -or- graphics is .
trans-unit.target: -or- graphics is .

trans-unit.source: -or- cellStyle is .
trans-unit.target: -or- cellStyle is .

trans-unit.source: paintParts is not a valid bitwise combination of values.
trans-unit.target: paintPartser ikke en gyldig bitvis kombinasjon av verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter kantlinjestilen for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Change the borders of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> by setting the properties of the AdvancedBorderStyle property to one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values.
trans-unit.target: Endre kantlinjer for gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>ved å angi egenskapene for AdvancedBorderStyle-egenskapen til en av de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som representerer kantlinjestilen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Get the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hent grensene for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer grensene for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter cellestilen for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Change the appearance of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> by setting the properties of the CellStyle property.
trans-unit.target: Endre utseendet til gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>ved å angi egenskapene for egenskapen CellStyle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains the cell style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som inneholder cellestilen for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Henter delen av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som må tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The ClipBounds property represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ClipBounds representerer området i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>som må være oppdateres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window, and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en bruker dekker hele for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>med en annen vinduet, og deretter finner den, og deretter ClipBounds representerer hele <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en bruker dekker et lite område for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, og deretter finner den, og deretter ClipBounds representerer lite område som ble dekkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer området i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som må tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende kolonneindeksen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnIndex property returns -1 when a row header cell is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ColumnIndex returnerer -1 når en rad overskriftscelle males.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kolonneindeksen gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som representerer en feilmelding for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is a row header cell, the ErrorText property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: Når gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>er en rad overskriftscelle egenskapen ErrorText tilsvarer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: When the current cell is a data cell, ErrorText is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: Når gjeldende celle celleegenskaper data, tilsvarer ErrorText <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer en feilmelding for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatted value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den formaterte verdien for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The FormattedValue property contains the value of the cell after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property has been applied to it, and after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event has been handled.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen FormattedValue inneholder verdien i cellen etter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>egenskapen som er brukt på den og etter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>hendelsen er håndtert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Formatert verdien for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å fargemerknader i gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å fargemerknader i gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Paints the specified parts of the cell for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Maler angitte delene av cellen for området i de angitte grensene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som angir området i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> males.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> verdier som angir delene skal males.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <>*> er mindre enn-1 eller større enn eller lik antallet rader i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen. - eller - <> </> *> er mindre enn-1 eller større enn eller lik antallet kolonner i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell background for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Maler cellebakgrunnen for området i de angitte grensene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som angir området i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> males.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til fargemerknader i bakgrunnen for de angitte grensene farger med det <> </> *>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til fargemerknader i bakgrunnen for de angitte grensene farger med det <> </> *>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <>*> er mindre enn-1 eller større enn eller lik antallet rader i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen. - eller - <> </> *> er mindre enn-1 eller større enn eller lik antallet kolonner i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell content for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Maler celleinnholdet for området i de angitte grensene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som angir området i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> males.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <>*> er mindre enn-1 eller større enn eller lik antallet rader i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen. - eller - <> </> *> er mindre enn-1 eller større enn eller lik antallet kolonner i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The cell parts that are to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Cellen delene som skal males.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> verdier som angir delene males.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter radindeks for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The RowIndex property returns -1 when a column header is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RowIndex returnerer -1 når en kolonneoverskrift males.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> verdier som angir tilstanden til cellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Value property contains the value of the cell before any formatting occurs.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Value inneholder verdien i cellen før formatering forekommer.

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.
